column5: July 9 A U.S. securities regulator ordered Wells Fargo Advisors LLC to pay $2.8 million to an investor who said the firm failed to detect fraudulent transactions and theft in its account  according to a securities arbitration ruling.

column4: World Fuel Services shares fall after Quebec train wreck
column5: Shares of World Fuel Services Corp  fell for a second day on Tuesday after the company said crude oil sold by one of its units was being carried by railcars involved in the deadly train derailment in Lac-Megantic  Quebec  last weekend.
